name: Campanula Childrens Hat
description: This hat is designed to keep the head, ears and forehead of little ones warm. Because of its unique pixie form it stays on the head. The hat is called Campanula because it looks a bit like a bluebell.
full_text: This hat is designed to keep the head, ears and forehead of little ones warm. Because of its unique pixie form it stays on the head. The hat is called Campanula because it looks a bit like a bluebell. Specifications: Yarn a) Hey Mama Wolf „Sockyarn #04“, 300 m /100 gr b) Hey Mama Wolf “Schafwolle #03“, 260 m /100 g c) Rauwerk & Hey Mama Wolf, 220 m /100 g Sizes 1 (2) Size 1 with yarn a): small new born or even premature baby Size 2 with yarn b): new born baby Size 1 with yarn b): around 2-4-month-old Size 2 with yarn b): around 4-10-month-old Size 1 with yarn c): around 10month- 2year old Size 2 with yarn c): around 2- 6-year-old Yardage around 15gr - 40gr, depending on yarn type and chosen size Tools dpns or needles of at least 80cm for magic loop Needle size depends on choice of yarn: a) 2.5mm b) 3.00mm c) 4.00mm Gauge swatch knit in 1/1 rib: k1, p1 a) 38 sts x 20 rows b) 32 sts x 32 rows c) 18 sts x 30 rows
